name: The Slightly Magical Story
description:
The Slightly Magical Story is a cute interactive story about magical girl who goes to the school and finds all kind of cute creatures on the way. There are 8 more or less different endings (if I counted them correctly).

This is my first text-based adventure ever, hope you like this small game. English is not my first language so I'm sorry if there is any errors in the game. The game is still in early development so please leave a comment below and tell me what you thought! You can also find me on Twitter @VilmaMVirtanen
